summary_promot:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Metadata:
            - Document Title: Frostsprout Twig
            - Section Title: Black Myth: Wukong Frostsprout Twig Location

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "# Frostsprout Twig

As with all other Curios' in Black Myth: Wukong, the Frosprout Twig can't be upgraded, so you can't increase its power or potency. Therefore, you will want to switch to other Curios items to better fit your build as you play via the Equipment menu.

## Black Myth: Wukong Frostsprout Twig Location

The Frostsprout Twig can be obtained by defeating Captain Lotus-Vision in the Pagoda Realm within The New West. From the Upper Pagoda Shrine, jump down in the gap behind the Shrine (inside the cave, not near the outer platforms) and defeat Captain Lotus-Vision to obtain the Curios. It is quite a difficult fight, but our boss breakdown and guide has tons of tips to help you out."
            - Following Text: "For even more guides and tips on finding all the items, be sure to check out our other guides. These include a breakdown of the Drinks locations, Soaks locations, where to find new Weapons, and all the Armor and Gear sets in the game."

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.
            3. Incorporate any relevant metadata (e.g., section or document titles) to improve coherence, **but do not assume any domain-specific knowledge** unless explicitly stated.
            4. Do **not** speculate beyond the visible content.



            Output Format:
            Preceding Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the preceding text that gives context to the image.
            Image Summary:
            Provide a summary of the image, describing its purpose and content based on the context.
            Following Text Summary:
            Provide a concise summary of the following text that elaborates on the information related to the image.
img_summary:
Preceding Text Summary:
The preceding text explains that the Frostsprout Twig is a non-upgradable Curios item in *Black Myth: Wukong*. Players are advised to switch to other Curios to better suit their build as they progress. It also provides detailed instructions on how to locate the Frostsprout Twig, which involves defeating Captain Lotus-Vision in the Pagoda Realm within The New West. The fight is challenging, but guides are available to assist players.

Image Summary:
The image depicts a player character standing on a rocky ledge overlooking a dark cave area. The scene appears to align with the description of the location where players must jump down behind the Upper Pagoda Shrine to access the cave and face Captain Lotus-Vision. The visual serves as a reference point for players to identify the correct location for obtaining the Frostsprout Twig.

Following Text Summary:
The following text encourages players to explore additional guides for locating various items in *Black Myth: Wukong*, including Drinks, Soaks, Weapons, Armor, and Gear sets. These guides aim to provide comprehensive assistance for item collection and gameplay optimization.
